record.description: Alpha Xi Delta national woman's college organization has brought two students from the Netherlands to attend American universities. Clara Caritas Meyers, graduate of Leyden University where her father is a professor of law will enter the University of Wisconsin; and Leender de Raad of Noordwyk is enrolled in international law courses at the University of Chicago. The students attended a lunch at the Sheraton hotel today February 4 as guests of the college organization. Left to right: Mrs. Donald Schellenbach (Alpha Xi Delta national president); Clara Caritas Meyers; Dr. B. V. M. J. van de Mortel (Netherlands Consul General); and Leendart de Raad.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
